EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}dice** ~ Rolls a normal dice to get a value from 1-6.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}dice 2d20** ~ Rolls two dice with a value from 1-20. It will also add up all the dice together to give a total as well.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}dice 2d20 +5 -4 +1** ~ `Advanced:` Use modifiers to update the result as you wish.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: `Note:` If you see any issues with the Advanced version please contact me on the support server using the invite command. üôè
USAGE: {{prefix}}dice *[amount of dice and highest value separated by `d`] [Modifiers]*
ALIASES: Dice does not have any aliases.
